cargoDetails.chapterDescription: STATIONERY, DRAWING, AND PAINTING SUPPLIES; PLAYING CARDS AND DICE; PHOTOGRAPHIC GOODS; PHOTOGRAPHIC AND CINEMATOGRAPHIC APPARATUS AND INSTRUMENTS; OPTICAL INSTRUMENTS AND INSTRUMENTS FOR MEASURING AND CHECKING; CLOCKS AND WATCHES; SCIENTIFIC INSTRUMENTS AND APPARATUS; MEDICAL AND SURGICAL INSTRUMENTS AND APPARATUS; APPARATUS FOR THE RECORDING AND REPRODUCTION OF SOUND AND IMAGES; APPARATUS FOR THE TRANSMISSION OR RECEPTION OF RADIO AND TELEVISION SIGNALS; APPARATUS FOR THE TRANSMISSION OR RECEPTION OF INFORMATION BY MEANS OF TELECOMMUNICATIONS; INSTRUMENTS AND APPARATUS FOR THE CONTROL, REGULATION, OR MEASUREMENT OF ELECTRIC CURRENT AND POWER; INSTRUMENTS AND APPARATUS FOR THE CONTROL, REGULATION, OR MEASUREMENT OF HEAT AND TEMPERATURE; INSTRUMENTS AND APPARATUS FOR THE CONTROL, REGULATION, OR MEASUREMENT OF PRESSURE AND FLOW; INSTRUMENTS AND APPARATUS FOR THE CONTROL, REGULATION, OR MEASUREMENT OF TIME AND FREQUENCY

remarks: 7 DAYS FREE TIME AT DESTINATION, ON DECK TOP STOWAGE
